package.name: Net_Geo
package.summary: Geographical locations based on Internet address
package.description: Obtains geogrphical information based on IP number, domain name, or AS number. Makes use of CAIDA Net_Geo lookup or locaizer extension.

release.notes: * Added use of pear Cache::Function * Added additional use of localizer API (see READ me for URL) * Bug #10 fixed * Typo in example fixed.
Very simplistic caching used which could do with a tidy up. Although the NetGeo server will accept domain names, the quality is very sporadic. Use IP or AS numbers for a better result.
